S.FORM: Say mang " Semang" i kamu nu Ma lay u tadah a kalung. Malay ya u mapuletay nu lumeniay a tademaw, kakenihan itini i Malay pandaw i teban nu buyuan, saan u satabalay nu Malay pandaw a muenengay a tademaw, sakamusa taneng sipakayda inipitademan talaayawen kunipisausian tu cacay a mangan nu ayaw a mihcaan. pulung nu tademaw tusa a malebut a tdemawan. (Semang) . 1 . 2000 . malalitin tu ihekalay atu zumaay a natinengan
